t: Sussex IM sells Mr. Lid brand, will continue molding
s: December 1, 2023 - While they have a loyal following ... the brand needed a fresh take on an old problem — losing the lids to your containers," the companies said when revealing the deal. Sussex IM, based in Sussex, Wis., uses a two-shot process to create Mr. Lid products, which features living hinges and comes in nine different container sizes.
